description: Notice of Proposed Procurement for Web Multi-media Content Consultant (Level 2)
full_summary:
***Government Tender Announcement***

**Project Title**
Web Multi-media Content Consultant (Level 2)
**Reference Number**
PW-22-01008174

**Notice Type**
Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method**
Competitive – Selective Tendering

**Contracting Entity**
Environment Canada
**Region of Opportunity**
National Capital Region (NCR)
**Region of Delivery**
National Capital Region (NCR)

**Publication Date**
2022-09-23
**Tender Closing Date**
2022-10-11T12:00:00
**Amendment Date**
2022-09-30

**Tender Status**
Expired

**Project Overview**
Environment Canada invites qualified suppliers to submit a bid for Web Multi-media Content Consultant (Level 2) services. The project involves the provision of online content development and maintenance services to support digital transformation initiatives. The selected consultant will be responsible for creating engaging web content, ensuring compliance with government guidelines, and developing a content strategy to enhance the department's online presence.

**Eligible Suppliers**
Accenture Inc.
Acosys Consulting Services Inc.
Evolving Web Inc.
Innobec and MDOS in JV
Jumping Elephants Incorporated
KIMBO Design Inc.
Real Decoy Inc.
Sierra Systems Group Inc.
Systemscope Inc.
Vurtur Communications Group
4165047 CANADA INC.
INNOVISION CONSULTING INC. (in joint venture)
NATTIQ INC.
Spearhead Management Canada Ltd
SRA Staffing Solutions Ltd
Sundiata Warren Group Inc.

**Contract Details**
Estimated quantity of commodity: 55
Duration of contract: from contract award date to 2023-03-31
Time frame of delivery: from contract award date to 2023-03-31

**Contact Information**
Procurement Team
Environment Canada
160 Elgin Street, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0H3, (phone number) or email [Sarmad.Al-Biladi@iaac-aeic.gc.ca](mailto:Sarmad.Al-Biladi@iaac-aeic.gc.ca).

Note that I left out the French version of the description, the date of arrival - contract expected start date and end date of the contract - as the project is now expired. Please clarify if you'd like to include it. 

I assume you want to keep the mandatory features – contract details, supplier list, project description – as usually required in government tenders. Let me know if you
